医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，在子宫内接触 SARS-CoV-2 的新生儿出现呼吸窘迫的风险更高研究人员发现，感染 SARS-CoV-2 的母亲所生的新生儿面临呼吸窘迫的风险增加，这可能是由于产前暴露引发的炎症反应所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Neonates-expose-to-SARS-CoV-2-in-utero-at-higher-risk-of-respiratory-distress-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Neonates-expose-to-SARS-CoV-2-in-utero-at-higher-risk-of-respiratory-distress-study-finds.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b869ce83-e7e8-4ed2-a4c0-0778ead4a721 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:42:00 -0500 Neonates exposed to SARS-CoV-2 in utero at higher risk of respiratory distress, study finds
美国心脏协会报告强调心脏病的差异，呼吁公平的医疗保健美国心脏协会关于心脏病和中风统计的报告强调健康公平并解决医疗保健中的结构性种族主义，揭示了不同社区之间心血管危险因素和疾病患病率的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/American-Heart-Association-report-highlights-disparities-in-heart-disease-calls-for-equitable-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/American-Heart-Association-report-highlights-disparities-in-heart-disease-calls-for-equitable-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae42972a-caf2-4d00-9715-b67fcafef039 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 18:34:00 -0500 American Heart Association report highlights disparities in heart disease, calls for equitable healthcare
简单的 20 米往返跑测试可预测超重儿童的大脑健康状况有氧健身通常被认为是儿童健康的最佳指标之一。它还与更好的学习成绩、执行功能和更大的脑容量有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Simple-20-meter-shuttle-run-test-predicts-brain-health-in-overweight-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Simple-20-meter-shuttle-run-test-predicts-brain-health-in-overweight-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a103e210-cb84-411e-ba9f-018380762749 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 15:17:15 -0500 Simple 20-meter shuttle run test predicts brain health in overweight kids
研究强调了“溜溜球节食”的负面后果一项新的定性研究强调了与“溜溜球节食”（也称为体重循环）相关的负面人际关系和心理后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Study-highlights-the-negative-consequences-linked-to-yo-yo-dieting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Study-highlights-the-negative-consequences-linked-to-yo-yo-dieting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50ddcfab-7316-4915-995a-8a0d2335d58e Mon, 29 Jan 2024 15:09:36 -0500 Study highlights the negative consequences linked to "yo-yo dieting"
研究表明，羟基脲治疗可以极大地有益于患有镰状细胞性贫血的儿童由印第安纳大学医学院的研究人员及其在乌干达的合作者领导的临床研究表明，羟基脲可显着减少镰状细胞性贫血儿童的感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Hydroxyurea-treatment-can-greatly-benefit-children-with-sickle-cell-anemia-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Hydroxyurea-treatment-can-greatly-benefit-children-with-sickle-cell-anemia-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=436bb08e-c513-4587-ac95-c6c6d5ef8004 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 15:02:27 -0500 Hydroxyurea treatment can greatly benefit children with sickle cell anemia, study reveals
OU 研究重点是成像技术的创新组合来检测胰腺癌俄克拉荷马大学健康科学大学健康史蒂芬森癌症中心的研究人员已经开始进行一项革命性的新研究，该研究可以提高对致命疾病的检测；胰腺癌 -;并让患者有机会活得更长久、更健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/OU-research-focuses-on-innovative-combination-of-imaging-techniques-to-detect-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/OU-research-focuses-on-innovative-combination-of-imaging-techniques-to-detect-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae3d92ac-bdf0-4b80-a5a1-ddfcf58d51f6 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 14:59:16 -0500 OU research focuses on innovative combination of imaging techniques to detect pancreatic cancer
亨利·福特健康中心和密歇根州立大学继续开展开创性的医学研究计划美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的“全民研究计划”向亨利·福特健康中心和密歇根州立大学健康科学中心颁发新奖项，密歇根人将继续有机会推进旨在推进个性化医疗保健的医学研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Henry-Ford-Health-and-MSU-continue-groundwriting-medical-research-initiative.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Henry-Ford-Health-and-MSU-continue-groundwriting-medical-research-initiative.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7ecfb6c-b1b5-43b2-96bd-0a73355c1b59 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 14:55:58 -0500 Henry Ford Health and MSU continue groundbreaking medical research initiative
呃验光研究人员警告不要使用低强度红光疗法来控制近视休斯顿大学验光研究人员警告不要使用低强度红光 (LLRL) 疗法作为控制近视或近视的方法，尤其是儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/UH-optometry-researcher-warns-against-the-use-of-low-level-red-light-therapy-to-control-myopia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/UH-optometry-researcher-warns-against-the-use-of-low-level-red-light-therapy-to-control-myopia.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e38e90-4a8b-48fd-b8de-7f9f36a56dca Mon, 29 Jan 2024 14:50:16 -0500 UH optometry researcher warns against the use of low-level red light therapy to control myopia
RNA 测序分析可用于诊断儿科 B-ALL 分子亚型急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL) 是最常见的儿童癌症，占所有儿科病例的 30% 以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/RNA-sequencing-analysis-feasible-for-diagnosis-of-molecular-subtypes-in-pediatric-B-ALL.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/RNA-sequencing-analysis-feasible-for-diagnosis-of-molecular-subtypes-in-pediatric-B-ALL.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7db2c7b-0619-4823-9a0b-7b3a359a4808 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 14:42:35 -0500 RNA sequencing analysis feasible for diagnosis of molecular subtypes in pediatric B-ALL
常见的生物标志物测试可能会误导一些患有乳腺癌的黑人女性的治疗伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校的最新研究表明，用于决定乳腺癌患者是否应该接受化疗的一项常见测试可能会给一些黑人女性提出不好的建议，导致她们放弃可能有帮助的化疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Common-biomarker-test-could-be-misguiding-treatment-for-some-Black-women-with-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240129/Common-biomarker-test-could-be-misguiding-treatment-for-some-Black-women-with-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9645a401-7f36-4378-9b4e-4b5d7cced4e2 Mon, 29 Jan 2024 13:35:56 -0500 Common biomarker test could be misguiding treatment for some Black women with breast cancer
